entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as being greeted by someone.

entities.name: parvati
entities.description: Parvati is mentioned as gazing at Hermione in disbelief and greeting Harry.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as being gazed at by Parvati, receiving looks of loathing from Krum's fan club, and being ignored by Ron.

entities.name: krum
entities.description: Krum is mentioned as having a fan club that gives Hermione looks of deepest loathing.

entities.name: pansy parkinson
entities.description: Pansy Parkinson is mentioned as gazing at Hermione in shock while walking by with Malfoy.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is mentioned as walking by with Pansy Parkinson and not insulting Hermione.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as ignoring Hermione while walking past her.

entities.name: professor mcgona-gall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is mentioned as telling the champions and their partners to get in line in pairs.

relationships.description: Parvati is gazing at Hermione in unflattering disbelief.
Krum's fan club gives Hermione looks of deepest loathing as they walk past her.
Pansy Parkinson gapes at Hermione in shock while walking by with Malfoy.
Malfoy is walking by with Pansy Parkinson and not insulting Hermione.
Ron walks right past Hermione without looking at her.
Professor McGonagall tells the champions and their partners to get in line in pairs.
